poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: This is a pep talk men. I tell you You're going to go in there And you're going to go in there prep Prep. Prep. Would someone help me? That was a perp walk. Man you just can't Bundle a president out of the courtroom Heel of your hand on the crown of his head Like he couldn't duck into a car by himself. You're going to go in there: I wish That I was going in there with you guys. Only fooling.
